Project Summary

Project Information

Field Value
Name JFlex Maven Plugin
Description This is a Maven 2/3 plugin to generate Lexer code in Java from a Lexer specification, using JFlex. This plugin was previously called maven-jflex-plugin. For JFlex 1.4.3 and earlier, see the maven-jflex-plugin documentation here: http://jflex.sourceforge.net/maven-jflex-plugin/
Homepage http://jflex.sourceforge.net/jflex-maven-plugin/

Project Organization

This project does not belong to an organization.

Field Value

ArtifactId jflex-maven-plugin
Version 1.6.1
Type maven-plugin
JDK Rev 1.5
